remarks: Deduction version of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ nfbr . (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
statement:
nfbrd.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x A ) $.
nfbrd.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x R ) $.
nfbrd.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x B ) $.
nfbrd $p |- ( ph -> F/ x A R B ) $.
